contextId.occurrenceNote: Because Deborah is certain of victory, she speaks as if Barak had already won the battle. Alternate translation: "Yahweh will give you victory" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-pastforfuture]])

This future event is spoken of as if it were a past event. This emphasizes that it will certainly happen. Alternate translation: "God will certainly help the Israelites defeat the Midianites" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-pastforfuture]])
contextId.glQuote: God has given him victory over Midian
